author: dennisl
msg: [MSITE-25] mvn site:deploy and site:stage-deploy ignores server configuration in settings.xml
o This patch fixes the site:stage-deploy goal

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed the node/service binding URI determination algorithm to handle services from included composites, by fusing the included composites before working on their binding URIs.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Cleaned up dependencies a bit. Added a .javascript file to allow Javascript references to support binding.http in addition to binding.jsonrpc and binding.atom.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Added a module to the tutorial to help illustrate how to integrate SCA components in a simple mashup.
